mywebserver

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • mywebserver.HttpRequest

  • public class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class MyHttpRequest represents all the methods related to formatting the HTTP request payload format to be sent to the Server.

        Constructor to create a custom HTTP Request payload
        Parameters:
        requestLine - the first line in the request containing the request method, file path, protocol
        httpRequestHeader - the HTTP Request header fields
        requestBody - the body of the Client's request
